name: arnahit.js
author: siyamak beheshti langroudi
description: js framework for creating web ui

scripts.build: rm -rf output && mkdir output && npx babel ./*.* --out-dir output --copy-files && npx babel arnahit/ --out-dir output/arnahit --copy-files &&  npx babel resources/ --out-dir output/resources --copy-files && cd output && npm install
